name: Combo WP Rewrite Slugs
author: CodeZel

sections.description:
Combo WP Rewrite Slugs is an easy to use plugin which provides functionality to rewrite your WordPress website URLs with not just ease but also with 100% accuracy.

What Combo WP Rewrite Slugs Will Does and Features

  • Rewrite Custom Post Types
  • Rewrite Categories and Taxonomies base
  • Rewrite WordPress Users base slug by user Roles
  • Completely Ajax base
  • Well Managed code
  • Easy to use
  • More features coming soon….

Our Other Plugins

  • Tailor Online – WooCommerce Plugin for Online Custom Tailoring (Tailors Online)
  • Shirt Designer – WooCommerce Plugin for Variations (Shirt Designer)

Combo WP Rewrite Slugs Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Combo WP Rewrite Slugs and find it useful, please consider (by rating our plugin with 5 star rating).

Translations

Come and assist us to translate the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire combo-wp-rewrite-slugs folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Rewrite Slugs’ menu under Tools menu in your WordPress admin panel.
sections.faq: Do you have questions or issues let us know by our profile page.

short_description: Rewrite your custom post types, taxonomies and user role slugs with ease.
